verses.roman:
preme matta cali' āilā govardhana-grāma
'harideva' dekhi' tāhāṅ ha-ilā praṇāma

synonyms: preme—in ecstatic love; matta—maddened; cali'-proceeding; āilā—came; govardhana-grāma—to the village known as Govardhana; hari-deva—the Deity named Harideva installed there; dekhi'-seeing; tāhāṅ—there; ha-ilā praṇāma—offered obeisances.
translation: Mad with ecstatic love, the Lord came to the village known as Govardhana. It was there that He saw the Deity Harideva and offered His obeisances unto Him.
